comments.html:
Hi there,

Sorry if I miss this in some older post, but how this sessions will take place? We need some aditional software (like webex for example) or just an internet browser?

Thanks!
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html: You haven't missed anything. I don't know yet what platform I'll use; for the moment I could choose between Webex and Placeware. In any case, all you'll need will be a browser (and maybe zillion of downloadable ActiveX files :).
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: I am pleased to see others have the same issues with dynamic routing and firewalls.  There is shared solace in numbers!
comments.name: Ronald Bartels
